This weekend, I won by being around inspirational women from different walks of life in the state of New York. I am so grateful to have competed with myself in the largest pageant in the country. 169 queens.👑 I walked away learning so much and I’m excited for what’s next.😉 Thank you from the bottom of my heart for all the words of encouragement, love, and support during this experience.❤️ There is so much more life after this and just know whatever it is that you want, it’s waiting for you.💫 Keep pushing and keep rising. Never stop chasing your wildest dreams!!!! THANK YOU NEW YORK 🗽🏙️

Forever thankful for this moment and this girl💙

Josie, I couldn’t have asked for a better first Miss. You held my hand (literally and figuratively) through every step of Miss NC week, and I felt so loved, supported, and encouraged the entire time. Your kindness, strength, and sparkle made this experience unforgettable—and I’m just so lucky you were the one standing beside me for it all. 💫

Love you endlessly🤍♾️
